page.title: 09LOCAL NEWS
page.content:
Bulldozers have now knocked down four old houses in Littlehampton to make way for the controversial Â£2.7 million Arun Ditrict Council block. The Arun Association of Parish Councils, Littlehampton town council and many more, have all opposed it. Dispite This the Arun District have gone ahead with the project.
Nude bathing on the West Beach has got official approvel. For an expremintal priod of one year the lesisure and Tourisim Committie of Arun District council agreed that 1985 should be time to bare all Littlehampton golf club was distroyed by fire .
Striking pulpils at Littlehampton school have been suppended for two weeks
